snippet: Apps that offer little in the way of information, advice or solutions, but much in the way of oddity and fascination.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column describes variety of mobile applications that offer little in the way of information or advice but provide a lot of entertainment.
lead_paragraph: Apps that offer little in the way of information, advice or solutions, but much in the way of oddity and fascination.

headline.print_headline: A Collection of Wonderful and Weird Amusements
headline.seo: Review: Eerie and Interesting Apps for Games and Amusement
headline.main: A Collection of Wonderful and Weird Amusements
